item.description: News from the [Flare](http:\/\/flarerpg.org) project has been sparse, if not silent.
After designing the Empyrean campaign's first major boss fight, it came time to tie it all in to the main quest.
Today, I implemented, what I think, is a useful feature into Flare.
Today, I finished laying out the first map of the first major dungeon in the Empyrean campaign.
I made some changes to this site today, mostly related to the navigation.
Things have been interesting for the passed few weeks.
The past month or so has been pretty good for Flare development.
In my last post, I mentioned the plan for a developer menu for Flare.
I've been a little inactive for the past week.
So Clint filled me in on his plans for the Empyrean campaign.
I mapped out the cave area for the coastal map I posted the other day.
Engine work for Flare has slowed down a lot, so I decided to start brainstorming some new map ideas.
Tonight, I hacked together a [set of features](https:\/\/github.com\/clintbellanger\/flare-engine\/pull\/1125) for Flare that I've had on the back burner for a while now.
One week later, I've finished all the tasks I had set out to complete on Flare.
Flare is close to version 1.0 now (probably the billionth time I've said that).
So, I've been wanting to put up some sort of blog here for a while now.
